Description: Verify that user can search for existing products
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to homepage|2. Enter 'dress' in search box|3. Click search button|4. Verify search results are displayed
Expected Result: Search results page shows products containing 'dress'

Description: Verify behavior when searching for non-existing products
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to homepage|2. Enter 'nonexistent123' in search box|3. Click search button|4. Verify no results message is displayed|5. Verify error message text

Description: Verify search handles special characters properly
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to homepage|2. Enter '!@#$%' in search box|3. Click search button|4. Verify appropriate handling of special characters
Expected Result: Search either shows no results or handles special characters gracefully

Description: Verify behavior when search is performed with empty input
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to homepage|2. Leave search box empty|3. Click search button|4. Verify appropriate behavior for empty search
Expected Result: Either shows all products or displays appropriate message

Description: Verify search results count and add product to cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to homepage|2. Enter 't-shirt' in search box|3. Click search button|4. Count the number of search results|5. Select any item from results|6. Click on add to cart
Expected Result: Product successfully added to cart with confirmation
